name: 陳春山
objective:
本課程旨在使學員掌握(1)併購法規架構、 (2)併購實務、 (3)併購英文，中長目標為：培育併購律師、法務長、財經法官。
This course is to achieve the following purposes:
(1)　　To understand the structure of M&A laws.
(2)　　To be familiar with M&A practice.
(3)　　To be fluent in M&A English
For the mid-long term goals, this course is to cultivate M&A lawyer, chief legal officer and financial-economic law judge.
